=== Something About Me ===

My name is Tomislav Marčinković. I was born in Zagreb on 18/06/83, and I have finished Faculty of civil engineering in Zagreb. I started with GNU/Linux in 2002. with Mandrake linux, I think it was version 9.2. After years I have tried many distros, but ended up on Ubuntu linux. 

=== My Interests ===

My interests are anything involved with GNU/Linux, and system administration.
